name: Tofu Broccoli Bok Choy Stir fry with Garlic Sesame Soy Sauce and Soba Noodles. Vegan Recipe
description: This Easy Tofu Broccoli Bok Choy Stir fry with garlic sesame soy sauce and soba noodles is a quick fix for weekday dinner. Allergen Information: Free of Dairy, egg, corn, nut. Can be made gluten-free with gf noodles.
recipeIngredient: 1  cups of Broccoli (small florets and thinly sliced stems)
1  large bok choy  (or a few baby bok choy)

recipeInstructions.text: In a shallow bowl, mix all the ingredients under Marinade(except tofu). Add cubed tofu and let sit for atleast 15 minutes to a few hours. Longer the better.
recipeInstructions.name: In a shallow bowl, mix all the ingredients under Marinade(except tofu). Add cubed tofu and let sit for atleast 15 minutes to a few hours. Longer the better.

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare the Soba noodles according to package instructions and keep aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Prepare the Soba noodles according to package instructions and keep aside.

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large skillet at medium heat. Add garlic and cook until golden.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat oil in a large skillet at medium heat. Add garlic and cook until golden.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the broccoli florets, broccoli stem, bok choy and 1/4 cup water. Cover and cook for 2 to 3 minutes or until bright green.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the broccoli florets, broccoli stem, bok choy and 1/4 cup water. Cover and cook for 2 to 3 minutes or until bright green.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the Tofu along with the marinade and cook for a minute. Add the noodles, pepper flakes and mix well. Cover and cook for 2 minutes or until heated through.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the Tofu along with the marinade and cook for a minute. Add the noodles, pepper flakes and mix well. Cover and cook for 2 minutes or until heated through.

recipeInstructions.text: Sprinkle sesame seeds and serve hot.
recipeInstructions.name: Sprinkle sesame seeds and serve hot.
